issue.title: tf::TransformListener() lookups always returning most recent tranform

content.raw:
I did run them back to back on the same computer. As a quick sanity check this morning I also made sure all my packages were up to date, rebooted, rebuilt the workspace after deleting my install folder, and the problem persists.

I’ll see if I can reproduce the problem with a simplified test case outside of our solution.
content.html:
